Description:

Continuation of a popular series of virtual racing GRID created with the wishes of a huge community of fans, work on the game was conducted in close collaboration with professional athletes and experts racing magazine Autosport. Feel like a real professional, participating in classical and modern forms of racing! In GRID Autosport, competing for the laurels of the winner, you will not only try to get around opponents, but also satisfy the ambitions of their sponsors. It is important to change your rating every position and every race could be crucial. In career mode GRID Autosport you can specialize in a particular discipline or try yourself in all - and each is a great experience! Feel strong voltage circuit racing, take part in long endurance races night, which will be a serious test of the quality of the tires of your iron horse, demonstrate the skill of driving open-wheel and show what you can, in extreme street races or competitions for tuning cars.
Features: 

- Different types of events and disciplines, including circuit race, endurance racing, drift racing on single-seater, modified cars, supercars and prototypes. 
- 22 locations and more than hundreds of different trails. 
- A huge car park and ample opportunities for modification of any machine. 
- Ability to control racing car with a view from the cockpit. 
- Multiplayer competition in the system RaceNet, uniting millions of players, weekly specials and team "clan" race. 
- Advanced AI drivers rivals actively defend their position and use your slightest misstep, to improve the situation on the track. 
- A variety of racing disciplines, co-op modes, and competition in the split screen mode.
Installation:

1. Mount with Daemon Tools or burn iso. 
2. Install the game! (no crack needed)
3. Play!
